thread.title: Ghana superstar Andre Ayew vows to 'get better' after Swansea winner at Villa
thread.title_full: Ghana superstar Andre Ayew vows to 'get better' after Swansea winner at Villa

title: Ghana superstar Andre Ayew vows to 'get better' after Swansea winner at Villa
text:
06:55 CET Ghana superstar Andre Ayew vows to 'get better' after Swansea winner at Villa - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Swansea City match-winner Andre Ayew says there is better to come from him as he grows more accustomed to the Premier League. 
Ayew, 25, scored a late winner against Aston Villa on Saturday to end Swanseaâ€™s six-match run without a win. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
